title: Divya Nettimi's Avala Global loses more staff despite a strong 2025
full_text:
Divya Nettimi's Avala Global loses more staff despite a strong 2025. The Viking Global spin-off was one of the industry's most-anticipated launches in recent years.. Avala Global was launched by Divya Nettimi in 2022.imagedepotpro/Getty Images
  • Divya Nettimi's $2 billion Avala Global has lost more personnel, Business Insider has learned.
